医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
大麻二酚可延长利氏综合征模型的寿命并改善症状由 UAB 神经科学研究所领导并发表在《自然通讯》杂志上的一项研究表明，在动物模型中每天服用大麻二酚 (CBD)（一种从大麻植物中提取的物质）如何延长寿命并改善与 Leigh 综合征相关的症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Cannabidiol-shown-to-extend-lifespan-and-improve-symptoms-in-Leigh-syndrome-models.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Cannabidiol-shown-to-extend-lifespan-and-improve-symptoms-in-Leigh-syndrome-models.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3985ab6d-53eb-462e-a198-31fcae9be475 Fri, 06 Sep 2024 14:07:37 -0400 Cannabidiol shown to extend lifespan and improve symptoms in Leigh syndrome models
香港科技大学研究人员推出环保消毒剂替代氯二甲酚氯二甲酚是世界范围内广泛使用的消毒剂，由于其相对较高的化学稳定性和大量消耗，与水环境中的生态毒理学威胁有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/HKUST-researchers-unveil-eco-Friendly-disinfectant-alternative-to-Chloroxylenol.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/HKUST-researchers-unveil-eco-Friendly-disinfectant-alternative-to-Chloroxylenol.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ec74287d-270a-4fc5-a407-aaafedd272fb Fri, 06 Sep 2024 14:01:36 -0400 HKUST researchers unveil eco-friendly disinfectant alternative to chloroxylenol
用于预测人类疫苗反应的人造淋巴器官芯片法国巴斯德研究所的研究人员开发出了人造“淋巴器官芯片”，可以重现人体免疫系统对加强疫苗的大部分反应https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Artificial-lymphoid-organ-chips-created-to-predict-vaccine-responses-in- humans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Artificial-lymphoid-organ-chips-created-to-predict-vaccine-responses-in- humans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2c46a04c-b36a-46ed-b2be-6248cb315b00 Fri, 06 Sep 2024 13:53:45 -0400 Artificial lymphoid organ-chips created to predict vaccine responses in humans
加州大学的埃里克·维克获得重大资助，以推进白血病联合疗法的研究辛辛那提大学癌症中心的 Eric Vick 医学博士、哲学博士荣获白血病和淋巴瘤协会 (LLS) 颁发的近 215,000 美元的职业发展奖和美国临床肿瘤学会 (ASCO) 颁发的 50,000 美元的青年研究者奖，以继续研究联合疗法治疗急性髓系白血病（AML）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/UCs-Eric-Vick-receives-major-grants-to-advance-research-into-combination-therapy-for-leukemia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/UCs-Eric-Vick-receives-major-grants-to-advance-research-into-combination-therapy-for-leukemia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b52c65e-5a19-4c45-8f89-9934c6ab039c Fri, 06 Sep 2024 13:45:08 -0400 UC's Eric Vick receives major grants to advance research into combination therapy for leukemia
研究揭示了驱动肺癌转移的关键信号通路当谈到癌症转移时，需要两个人一起探戈。这是纪念斯隆凯特琳癌症中心 (MSK) 的研究人员领导的一项新研究的主要发现之一：TGF-β 和 RAS 信号通路共同作用，刺激肺腺癌中癌症的扩散，肺腺癌是癌症死亡的主要原因世界各地。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Study-reveals-key-signaling-pathways-driven-lung-cancer-metastasis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Study-reveals-key-signaling-pathways-driven-lung-cancer-metastasis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6d1a78a8-a1fc-4e06-9825-982397c5dfd6 Fri, 06 Sep 2024 13:33:56 -0400 Study reveals key signaling pathways driving lung cancer metastasis
新的成像技术可以帮助识别癌症免疫治疗引起的肾损伤免疫检查点抑制剂（ICIs）是一类彻底改变了癌症治疗方法的免疫疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/New-imaging-technique-could-help-identify-kidney-injury-from-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/New-imaging-technique-could-help-identify-kidney-injury-from-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d089b02f-beff-46be-a89d-2dc7a59b3525 Fri, 06 Sep 2024 13:08:29 -0400 New imaging technique could help identify kidney injury from cancer immunotherapy
研究发现，医护人员在用药错误后普遍存在心理困扰东芬兰大学的一项新研究表明，心理困扰是医疗保健专业人员在用药错误后最常见的负面结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Psychological-distress-common-among-healthcare-workers-after-medication-errors-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Psychological-distress-common-among-healthcare-workers-after-medication-errors-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=605b2e89-58dd-426f-96ff-f85298e10c06 Fri, 06 Sep 2024 13:00:58 -0400 Psychological distress common among healthcare workers after medication errors, study finds
牙周炎患者的血液中表现出独特的炎症蛋白谱瑞典于默奥大学的一项新研究表明，患有牙周炎的人血液中各种蛋白质的浓度发生了变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Individuals-with-periodontitis-exhibit-unique-炎症-蛋白质-profile-in-the-blood.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Individuals-with-periodontitis-exhibit-unique-炎症-蛋白质-profile-in-the-blood.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f9a11a2c-74ee-40de-9084-4b1e2fefa646 Fri, 06 Sep 2024 12:55:21 -0400 Individuals with periodontitis exhibit unique inflammatory protein profile in the blood
新的 DELIVER 指南旨在加速纳米医学的发展它们是比人类头发小 1000 倍的微型药物输送系统，虽然纳米药物长期以来一直被誉为治疗衰弱和危及生命的疾病的未来，但它们从实验室到患者的旅程面临许多挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/New-DELIVER-guidelines-aim-to-accelerate-nanomedicine-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/New-DELIVER-guidelines-aim-to-accelerate-nanomedicine-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c01bf319​​-98e0-4d3b-b570-657ca5057e4e Fri, 06 Sep 2024 12:43:43 -0400 New DELIVER guidelines aim to accelerate nanomedicine development
新型单克隆抗体似乎能有效中和多种 SARS-CoV-2 变体单克隆抗体似乎可以有效中和 SARS-CoV-2 的多种变体以及动物体内的相关病毒，这些病毒如果开始在人类中传播，可能会构成威胁。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Novel-monoclonal-antibody-appears- effective-at-neutralizing-numerous-SARS-CoV-2-variants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Novel-monoclonal-antibody-appears- effective-at-neutralizing-numerous-SARS-CoV-2-variants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9e81d59d-6eae-4988-b31b-caf8b6141355 Fri, 06 Sep 2024 12:33:02 -0400 Novel monoclonal antibody appears effective at neutralizing numerous SARS-CoV-2 variants
